hadiths.text: A'isha (Allah be pleased with her) reported:I used to perfume the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) with a perfume containing musk before entering upon the state of Ihram and on the day of sacrifice (10th of Dhu'l-Hijja) and (at the conclusion of Ihram) before circumambulating the House (for Tawaf-i-Ifada)
